topic: Registration for practical course not possible
question: According to my study plan, I have a practical course and a seminar this semester. In TUMOnline there is no registration for this course for any of the possible practical courses or seminars. How can I register for an practial course and get a place?
answer: The registration for practical courses and seminar courses is not possible via TUMonline, but only through participating in the matching system. All necessary information can be found on docmatching.in.tum.de.
